title: Order number and date of grant of development / building permission / redevelopment permission issue
clause_text: Order number and date of grant of development / building permission / redevelopment permission issued by the Authority; Such Display Board shall not be required for individual plot holder's individual building.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
